newsitem.title: BELGIUM: Belgian Solvay drops on earnings fears.
newsitem.headline: Belgian Solvay drops on earnings fears.

text.p: Shares in Belgian chemicals group Solvay SA dropped more than two percent on the Brussels bourse on Wednesday on profit-taking ahead of the release of first-half 1997 earnings on Thursday, dealers said.
At 1055 GMT, Solvay was down 2.1 percent at 23,375 after earlier touching a low of 23,250 francs.
"People are getting out because they are not all too positive about the results," one trader said.
Another said Solvay was weighed down by first-half earnings of Dutch chemicals group DSM NV earlier on Wednesday which were at the lower-end of market expectations.
Dealers earlier said DSM would provide a good indication for Solvay's results.
